hero.title: Feature-rich Picture Reader
hero.description: Supports multiple image formats with AI-powered analysis capabilities
hero.tagline: Extract Webpage Images | Image Manipulation | Slideshow Playback | Image Size Filtering | Batch Download | Auto Load
hero.descriptionFull: Picture Reader is a powerful browser extension that helps you extract, organize, and download images from any webpage. Experience seamless image management with our intuitive interface.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Powerful Features for Image Management
features.description: Everything you need to efficiently handle images from any webpage

unifiedImageBrowsing.title: Unified Image Browsing
unifiedImageBrowsing.description: Extract and view all images from any webpage in a clean, organized interface

imageManipulation.title: Image Manipulation
imageManipulation.description: Zoom, rotate, and navigate through images with intuitive controls

slideshowPlayback.title: Slideshow Playback
slideshowPlayback.description: Automatically play through images with customizable intervals

sizeFiltering.title: Size Filtering
sizeFiltering.description: Filter images based on dimensions to find exactly what you need

batchDownload.title: Batch Download
batchDownload.description: Download multiple images simultaneously with just one click

autoLoad.title: Auto-Load
autoLoad.description: Automatically load images as you scroll through long webpages
